body:
To use Honeybee you need to have some basic Grasshopper knowledge. I think a great place to start is to watch Chris's tutorial on Daylighting with Honeybee.



<iframe _origwidth="560" allowfullscreen="" frameborder="0" height="267" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/QZqJpgVhPBo?list=PLsXrsIom0lQ5IFrhEa9XBVk9litiP49cT&wmode=opaque" width="475"></iframe>
